h2_title: How to Understand the Mid-to-Late Game Skills Trees
h3_title: Best Staff Stances Skills to Unlock
content: The aim for the Staff Stances category is to get 20 points in there at least to eventually unlock Focus Attack IV and have 4 Focus Points you can build up at a time.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Best_Skills_to_Unlock.md', within the main section titled 'Best Skills to Unlock', specifically from the subsection 'How to Understand the Mid-to-Late Game Skills Trees' and the sub-subsection 'Best Staff Stances Skills to Unlock'.
The content is as follows:
The aim for the Staff Stances category is to get 20 points in there at least to eventually unlock Focus Attack IV and have 4 Focus Points you can build up at a time.
